title: Apartment for sale in Rajagiriya
details: The living is easy in this impressive, generously proportioned contemporary residence located in the heart of Rajagiriya. The floor plan encompasses two spacious bedrooms, three luxurious bathrooms, and a sleek and stylish kitchen that flows through to the dining room. This home is perfect for a couple and is ideally positioned to enjoy the proximity to cafes, restaurants and shopping centres.
